description: a(n) = least positive integer > a(n-1) and not a(i)*a(j) for 1 <= i <= j < n.
links: Vincenzo Librandi, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..5000
mathematica: a[1]=1; a[n_] := a[n] = (t= Union[Flatten[Table[a[i] a[j], {i, 1, n-1}, {j, i, n-1}]]]; Do[If[FreeQ[t, k], an = k; Break[]], {k, a[n-1]+1, Last[t]+1}]; an); Array[a, 60] (* _Jean-Fran√ßois Alcover_, May 06 2011 *)Select[Range[110], OddQ[Total[FactorInteger[#]][[2]]] &] (* _T. D. Noe_, May 07 2011 *)
prog: (PARI) is(n)=bigomega(n)%2 || n==1 \\ _Charles R Greathouse IV_, Sep 16 2015
crossrefs: Apart from initial term, same as A026424.
